'''Athos''' is a member of the [[Knights of Favonius]] located in the [[City of Mondstadt]], [[Mondstadt]]. He guards the entrance of the [[Knights of Favonius Headquarters]] alongside [[Porthos]].

===Appearance===
Athos wears one of the standard uniforms of the Knights of Favonius. The uniform consists of a black long-sleeve shirt and horse riding pants with white plate armor worn on top. However, the poleyns, greaves, and sabatons are black. The Knights of Favonius crest decorates the breastplate.

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Athos:''' Welcome to the Knights of Favonius!
:{{DIcon}} What is this place?
::'''Athos:''' This is the Knights of Favonius Headquarters.
::'''Athos:''' Here you can find the Grand Master's office, the Library, and all manner of other facilities.
::'''Athos:''' As much as I would love to give you the grand tour, I'm afraid I have to stay at my post.
:{{DIcon}} Goodbye.
::'''Athos:''' I hope you find what you need here.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Trivia==
* Athos shares the same English voice actor with [[Lyney]].

===Etymology===
* Athos is named after one of the ''{{w|The Three Musketeers}}''. The other characters who follow this naming convention are [[Porthos]] and [[Aramis]].
